name: Smooch Labs
description:
👄 Smooch Labs 👄  is a 2-player game about robots training to do big kisses. Slam those metal lips together to get the highest score you can under the time limit!

💋 Smooch Labs is part of the Very Very Spaceship Smooch Jam! 💋 Held over a weekend at the VVS Mothership the team set off to make games all about kissin'.

Check out the other games here:
Hot Date
Long Distance Lovers

Check out more of our streams 'n' projects on our social channels: ✨http://vvspaceship.website
